page.title: 08DRIVING SCHOOL LOWER HEATH
page.content: Mr Stokes has been a{driving {instructor}for 32 years.He has 9{cars 7 on instruction and 2 spare.It is {Â£8.00}per lesson in a school car and {Â£7.50}in your own car.A test costs {Â£14.40.}The business started in 1955. Last year they changed from{Minis}to {Metro City X.}There are{7 full time workers 2 of them are female and 0 part time workers.It is{50 minutes}per lesson because if the instructor was really instructing the driver he would not take it all in if they did an hour There are 2 mirrors in the car so that the instructor can see traffic behind as well as the driver.He teaches people from all over the country.Some cars have{2 lots of controls.}You can start learning to drive on{public {roads}at{17.}Mr Stokes has taught a lady of 82,handicapped people and a deaf and dumb person to drive.
